name: American dad QTE Intro.
description:
Gameplay:

Its just a video intro from a cartoon that requires pressing qte during movements. 

Goal:
Complete 6 levels. (The sixth one is quite difficult, I myself did not pass it completely honestly).

Controls: 

Arrows: WASD/↑↓→← 

Interact : E 

Legs: Space

Gamepad supported.

Speedrun:

You can turn on timer if you want and speed modificator.

The game has two speedrun skips, on two levels. Consecutive pressing of certain buttons activates skips. I didn't write how to do it, maybe someone will find out.
